channel.title: Todu Tinige'-hu Siha gi 2023 on Dihan Dabit
channel.description: Recent content in Todu Tinige'-hu Siha gi 2023 on Dihan Dabit

item.title: Håfa Guáguaha gi Lina'lå'-hu
item.description: Håfa adai todus! Ai na inapmam na manugi' yu' guini, dispensa. Tinátani' yu' sa' guaha buuulalala gi lina’lå'-hu på’gu. Hu ha' sangåni hamyu: Finé’nena: mama’títinas yu' guinahan finu' Chamoru! 🤓 Siña ma’alíligao yu' gi Instagram yan TikTok. Hu tutuhun mama’tinas bidiu siha sa' sigi hu li’i' i bidio-ña siha si Saina Metgot ya humallum yu' na guaha meggai na taotao ni malagu' umetyak fuminu' Chamoru. Sénmaguf yu' na hu chócho’gui ini sa' a) ini muna’mámaguf yu' yan b) ini muna’lámaolik i umadingån-hu yan i tiningo'-hu ni finu' Chamoru.

item.title: Fa'måmaolik i Diksionårio-ku
item.description: Have you ever looked for a word in “The Official CHAMORRO-ENGLISH Dictionary”? If you have, perhaps you’ve noticed that the words aren’t sorted exactly according to i atfabetun Chamoru. Take for instance the following set of words pulled directly from the dictionary mentioned above Here we see that kamuti comes before kåmyu which comes before kana'. At first glance it doesn’t seem to be an issue: “m” does come before “n”.

item.title: Manalíligåo Komunidåt
item.description: Sinientéte-ku na gumof takhilu' i tiningo'-hu finu' Chamoru sa' gai månngi' na komunidåt yu' 🤓. Guaha mangga’chong-hu ni manútungu' lokkui' taimanu fuminu' Chamoru, yan gi magåhit: gof suetti yan maguf yu' na manásodda' ham. Mandádanña' ham kada sǻbalu. Guaha tulu na prinaktika ni hu késåonåo yan guaha na biåhi ti siña hu såonåo todu, låo tengnga hu késåonåo i fine’nenå-hu na gurupu sa' siha i “OG” 🤘🏽; kalang guaha takhilu' na lugåt gi kurason-hu nu siha.

item.title: Bira Yu’ Tåtti gi Eskuela...Låo Ti Ya-hu
item.description: Ai lokkui’…atan yu’: sessu tinani’ ya ti manugi’ yu’ desdi ki Eneru! 😅 Ya pues, ai hunggan - bira yu’ tåtti gi eskuela! Hu tutuhun iyo-ku “masters program” gi “Computer Science” (CS) låoooo…gi magåhit…ti ya-hu 🙃. Gof malagu’ yu’ tumungu’ mås put CS, låo esti na prugråma…ehhhh…ti ya-hu taimanu mafa’nå’guen-ña i klas. Ti malagu’ yu’ kumeha mampus guini…malagu’ ha’ yu’ muna’tútungu’ hamyu håfa guáguaha gi lina’lå’-hu på’gu 🤙🏽. Para u funhåyan i klas gi tinituhun Mayu, ya ti siña hu nangga put eyu!

item.title: Åpmam na Manugi' Yu' Guini
item.description: Hu prumeti hamyu na ti maleffa yu' nu ini na “blog” 😁. Ginin i ma’pus na Huliu, hu gof na’siguru na siña yu' manugi' guini sa' masangåni yu' na ti siña pumo’lu iyo-ku na kod gi publikun sagan kod1, yan kåo un tungu' månu nai hu po’lu ini na “blog”?… Ha’a, dinanchi!…gi publikun sagan kod! 🙃 Ya pues ti manugi' “blog” asta ki sen siguru yu' na siña manugi' yu' guini!
